definition: one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
to blend into one another/to blend together well
lit. one body two sides (idiom)/fig. a situation with two sides to it
both near and distant treated alike (idiom)

sentences.english: Because our triune God is the God of all grace.
sentences.chinese: 因爲我們的三位一體神是充滿恩典的神。

sentences.english: A language is itself just because the way it is.
sentences.chinese: 每一種語言都是自成一體的。

sentences.english: Then reality becomes a perfect model that the order of all the forms entangles in integration.
sentences.chinese: 現實也變成了所有糾纏於一體的形式秩序的完美模型。

sentences.english: The Company for Trade and Industry Branch of the Hi-Tech enterprise integration.
sentences.chinese: 本公司爲科工貿一體化的高科企業。

sentences.english: Is a research and development, production and sales of electronic and electrical appliances factory.
sentences.chinese: 是一家集研發，生產，銷售爲一體的電子電器廠。

sentences.english: These two poems help me to further comprehend limitless oneness .
sentences.chinese: 這兩首詩令我對無限的一體有更進一步的體認。

sentences.english: The heart of the Aztecs' power was an economic unity.
sentences.chinese: 阿芝科特政權的核心是一個經濟統一體。

sentences.english: The invention is a microminiature high rotating speed tool shank, relating to electromechanical integration field.
sentences.chinese: 本發明爲一種微小型高轉速刀柄，屬機電一體化領域。

sentences.english: And last, cultural industry needs to be expanded and economic culture integration carried forward.
sentences.chinese: 第四要拓展文化產業，推進經濟文化一體化。

sentences.english: E-billing as one of modern logistics enterprises.
sentences.chinese: 電子商務結算爲一體的現代化物流企業。

sentences.english: Evonik benefits specifically from its innovative prowess and integrated technology platforms.
sentences.chinese: 贏創的發展得益於其創新實力和一體化技術平臺。

sentences.english: One type of design, save the size, easy to install.
sentences.chinese: 一體式的設計，節省體積，方便安裝。

sentences.english: Europeanization and European Integration are two central terms in the EU study.
sentences.chinese: 歐洲化和一體化是歐盟研究的兩個核心概念。

sentences.english: Economic regionalization is an important trend in the development of world Economy.
sentences.chinese: 區域經濟一體化是世界經濟發展的一個重要趨勢。

sentences.english: Hongye Rubber Factory set-occupied and rental office as a whole.
sentences.chinese: 宏業橡膠廠辦公樓集自用和出租爲一體。

sentences.english: Guest room style mahjong room is on F5 of main building, used for accommodation and entertainment.
sentences.chinese: 客房式麻將屋位於主樓5樓，集住宿娛樂於一體。

definition: to revolve around/to center on (an issue)
to own exclusively/unique to/specific/there is only
to oppose/to set sth against/to be antagonistic to/antithetical/relative opposite/opposing/diametrical
to conform (with)/to echo/to correlate well/(linguistics) agreement
